Name: Zoning, 217-14 24th Avenue Rezoning, Queens (N 240298 ZRQ).
Title: Application number N 240298 ZRQ (217-14 24th Avenue Rezoning) submitted by BMBT LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Queens, Community District 11, Council District 19.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
